rules.natural: Provided that the audience group is engaged, if the sunset show is scheduled, then the plant centerpiece has a spotlight.
If the plant centerpiece is watered, it follows that it is healthy.
Either the curator has access to the main platform, or it is not the case that the technician has access to the main platform.
Under the condition that the director is present, the curator is also present.
If the director is present, then the technician is present.
Provided that the director is present, the guest is present.
Either the director is present, or the main platform is operational, or the grand facility is open.
If the director has permission for the main platform, then the curator has permission for the main platform.
Provided that the guest is invited, if the guest is present, then the technician is not present.
Either the guest is invited or the guest is a VIP.
Under the condition that the guest is a VIP, whenever the guest is present, the technician is not present.

If the security person is alerted, then under the condition that it is not the case that either the main platform is operational or the grand facility is open, it follows that the main platform is not closed.
Either the security person is alerted or the manager is alerted.

Either the main platform is repaired, or if it is not the case that when the manager is alerted, then under the condition that it is not the case that either the main platform is operational or the grand facility is open, it follows that the main platform is not closed, then the main platform is inspected.
Either the staff person is supervised, or if the staff person is trained, then provided that the main platform is staffed, either the main platform is operational or the grand facility is open.
Provided that the technician has permission for the main platform, either the main platform is ready or the grand facility is open.
If the main platform is cleared, then the main platform is not blocked.
Whenever the plant centerpiece has a spotlight, it is not the case that the main platform is occupied.
If it is not the case that either the main platform is operational or the grand facility is open, then the main platform is closed.
If it is not the case that if the curator is present, then the sunset show has started, then the sunset show is delayed.
If it is not the case that if the curator has permission for the main platform, then the technician has permission for the main platform, then the main platform is blocked.
If it is not the case that if the grand facility is not open, then the plant centerpiece is watered, then the technician has access to the main platform.
Whenever the grand facility is not open, the main platform is occupied.
If the grand facility is not open, then the sunset show is scheduled.
Provided that the grand facility is not open, it is not the case that the plant centerpiece is healthy.
